pluggable.name: Extra Content
pluggable.author: The Habari Community
pluggable.description: Display one additional textarea on the entry publish page.

help.value:
Activate, then create a new entry or edit an existing one to see the new textarea. Display it with <?php echo $post->info->extra; ?> wherever you have a Post object.

It can be formatted as such: <?php echo Format::autop( $post->info->extra ); ?>.
